glsa.title: util-linux: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in util-linux, the worst of which may lead to Denial of Service.

background.p: util-linux is a suite of Linux programs including mount and umount, programs used to mount and unmount filesystems.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in util-linux. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker may be able to cause a Denial of Service condition, trigger corruption of /etc/mtab, obtain sensitive information, or have other unspecified impact.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All util-linux users should upgrade to the latest version:
